explanation: [0-0] In an outdoor scene, a little bald boy wearing a yellow shirt and blue pants sits on the grass on the left side. A little girl with braided hair and a purple striped shirt kneels on the grass on the right side. The bald boy is holding a doll, and the girl in the purple striped shirt is looking down with her hands on the building blocks on the ground. The background is a residence with a yellow door. There are two toy cars and a yellow duck on the grass. There is a colorful logo in the upper left corner that says "JUGNU KIDS".
